statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords;
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords WHERE employee_id = 1002;
SELECT MAX(check_out_time) AS latest_checkout FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords WHERE check_in_time >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_time <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords ORDER BY check_in_time DESC
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords WHERE check_in_time >= '2022-01-15'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendanceRecords WHERE employee_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, date, time_in FROM employee_attendance WHERE time_in > '08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM suspicious_activity GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_attendance;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, date, time_in FROM employee_attendance WHERE date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, time_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE time_out < '17:00:00' AND date = '2021-11-15';
SELECT activity_id, employee_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activity WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE employee_id = 1002;
SELECT activity_description, activity_time FROM suspicious_activity ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, attendance.check_in_time FROM employee JOIN attendance ON employee.employee_id = attendance.employee_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT department) AS num_departments FROM employee;
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, attendance_status FROM employee WHERE attendance_status = 'Late';
SELECT employee_id, department, COUNT(*) as attendance_count FROM employee GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT e.employee_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time FROM employee e JOIN attendance a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE a.check_in_time < '2022-01-01';

SELECT e.employee_name, sa.activity_description, sa.activity_time FROM employee e JOIN suspicious_activity sa ON e.employee_id = sa.employee_id WHERE sa.activity_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sa.activity_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance_records;
SELECT employee_id, is_late FROM employee_attendance_records WHERE is_late = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT activity_description, activity_date, activity_time FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, log_date, log_message FROM surveillance_logs WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY log_date ASC, log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance_records WHERE is_late = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_time FROM surveillance_logs WHERE employee_id = 456;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employee_details WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, check_in_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM attendance_logs WHERE employee_id = 2002;
SELECT employee_name, check_out_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1002 ORDER BY check_out_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, check_in_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(check_in_time), MIN(check_out_time) FROM attendance_logs;
SELECT employee_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM attendance_logs GROUP BY employee_id HAVING attendance_count > 1;
